ing: 1 cup fresh spinach leaves, or to taste
1 (1/2 inch) piece fresh ginger root, peeled
des: "A bright and fresh green smoothie sure to blast away the winter blues! Serve over ice."
ins: Place water, spinach, apple, orange, cucumber, cranberries, and ginger in a blender. Blend on low until just combined; increase speed to high and blend until smooth and liquefied, about 1 minute.
